Articles.Content:
One if by land, two if by sea-

Hi there. I'm Paul Revere.

Recently purchased Kerbal Space Program, and I'm loving it so far.

Just a simple question. When I try to change my profile picture (on these forums),

it gives me this:

Paul Revere, you do not have permission to access this page. This could be due to one of several reasons:

Your user account may not have sufficient privileges to access this page. Are you trying to edit someone else's post, access administrative features or some other privileged system?

If you are trying to post, the administrator may have disabled your account, or it may be awaiting activation.

Help?

Users with less than 5 posts have some restrictions on their account to help prevent spammers from getting in. I'll go ahead and get you set up since you don't sound like a spammer to me.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
